content: tiny teal handcrafted the colour block boxy tee the colour block boxy tee - victoria lewis - tiny teal handcrafted - copyright 2021 1 the colour block boxy is a super simple easily customisable top down sweater you can simply follow the main instructions to create a lovely boxy fit sweater but there are also many opportunities for you to customise the fit of your sweater to be the perfect fit for your body i will guide you through the options as we come to them so you feel comfortable making each decision the colour block boxy can be knit entirely in one colour and will be fantastic but i cordially invite you to let your creative side run wild you could fade from one colour to another create a marled fabric by holding two strands of yarn together colour block with coordination or contrasting colours or even add a fluffy layer with some suri silk or mohair the pattern is written for adults and juniors with designed to be a boxy fit i recommend 6-8 15- sizes ranging from 2-4yrs to adult 60 chest 20cm positive ease for adult sizes and 2-4 5- 10cm for junior sizes the pattern is written for dk weight yarn this can be a single strand of dk weight or you can the listed sizes are the finished measurements so hold strands together as long as you are able to choose an ease that you feel most comfortable obtain gauge with i am a 35 bust and my black and speckled grey sample sweater is a size 42 giving me 7 the adult instructions start on page 3 positive ease the junior instructions start on page 7 the sizes given are finished bust size measured at the widest point so just apply your chosen ease to your actual bust measurement and then choose the nearest size this applies to both the adult and junior sizes the colour block boxy tee -
